levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Garden of Thorns​</line-height>
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] At 3+ highest Reson., Atk Weight +1
[WhenUse] Apply 1 '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) [AttackDmgUp]' and '1 (Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up' to (1 + # of highest Reson.) allies.
- At 4+ Corresponding Reson., apply 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) [AttackDmgUp]'

coindescs.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage for 15% HP of their max HP
- Heal (highest Reson. - 2) more allies (max 3)

levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Garden of Thorns​</line-height>
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (# of highest Reson. - 2) Atk Weight (Max 2)
[WhenUse] Apply 1 '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) [AttackDmgUp]' and '1 (Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up' to (2 + # of highest Reson.) allies.
- At 4+ Corresponding Reson., apply 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) [AttackDmgUp]'
- At 5+ Corresponding Reson., apply 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up'

coindescs.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal 2 allies with the lowest HP percentages for 18% HP of their max HP
- Heal (highest Reson. - 2) more allies (max 3)

levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Garden of Thorns​</line-height>
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (# of highest Reson. - 2) Atk Weight (Max 3)
[WhenUse] Apply 1 '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) [AttackDmgUp]' and '1 (Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up' to (4 + # of highest Reson.) allies.
- At 4+ Corresponding Reson., apply 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) [AttackDmgUp]'
- At 5+ Corresponding Reson., apply 1 additional '(Corresponding Sin Affinity) Power Up'
- At 6+ Corresponding A-Reson., apply the above effects next turn as well

coindescs.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal 4 allies with the lowest HP percentages for 22% HP of their max HP
- Heal (highest Reson. - 2) more allies (max 3)

levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Bygone Days​</line-height>
levelList.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal 10 SP to self and 2 other allies with the least SP
- If target survives this attack, consume 5 [Sinking] Countบนtarget, then heal additional SP(to self & affected allies) equal to [Sinking] Potencyบนtarget (Max SP heal: 20)
- If target is defeated, inflict 3 [Sinking]บน2 random enemies (For Focused Encounters, random Parts)

levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Bygone Days​</line-height>
levelList.desc:
[EndSkill] Heal <style="highlight">12</style> SP to self and 2 other allies with the least SP
- If target survives this attack, consume 5 [Sinking] Countบนtarget, then heal additional SP(to self & affected allies) equal to [Sinking] Potencyบนtarget (Max SP heal: 20)
- If target is defeated, inflict 3 [Sinking] and <style="highlight">1 [Curse]</style>บน2 random enemies (For Focused Encounters, random Parts)

levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Solemn Lament​</line-height>
levelList.desc:
When this Skill flips Coins, each เหรียญ flips against a random enemy among its targets.
- The first เหรียญ always targets the main target.
- All 'On Hit' effects and all damage dealt by each เหรียญ are inflicted only against the random target the เหรียญ selected.
When inflicting [SinkingWhite] with this Skill effects: (Chance to flip Heads)% chance to inflict The Departed. If this unit did not inflict The Departed, inflict The Living instead. (calculates every [SinkingWhite] stack independently)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] At 0+ SP, Reuse this เหรียญ (5 times max per Skill)

levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Christmas Nightmare​</line-height>
levelList.desc: [EndSkill] At max HP, heal 10 SP at Turn End and gain 1 [Enhancement] next turn

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[OnSucceedAttack] If target is in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states, inflict 1 [Reduction] next turn
